dialogue.htmlContent:
While the door before you bears the promising sign 'Bureau of Property and Commerce; Open to the public', someone has stuck a sheet of paper beneath it, which reads:

Transfer of property rights has been suspended until further notice. We do not know when service will resume.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

Letting out a sigh as you realise that purchasing property within Dominion will remain impossible for the time being, you turn around and decide to head elsewhere...
